snippet: The Republican candidate’s comments over the work ethic of Marco Rubio play to a cliché that economists say and statistics show is grossly exaggerated.

byline.contributor: Aurelien Breeden contributed reporting from Paris.

abstract: Jeb Bush's comment about brevity of French workweek during Republican debate is put into historic perspective with similar comments made by Republicans in past; data shows French work hours and productivity play against stereotype.
lead_paragraph: The Republican candidate’s comments over the work ethic of Marco Rubio play to a cliché that economists say and statistics show is grossly exaggerated.

headline.print_headline: Bush’s Jab at France Keeps Up a Tradition in G.O.P. Politics
headline.main: Bush’s Jab at France Keeps Up a Tradition in G.O.P. Politics
